channel.title: Checking if a tile is walkable client-sided?
channel.description:
Hi guys. How can I check whether a tile location within a region (given as (20, 20) for example) is walkable (or vice versa).
I've tried checking for [i]CollisionMap[/i] flags but am having no luck at present.

item.title: Checking if a tile is walkable client-sided?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Thanks. I had to use these flags: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/configuration/347961-tile-clipping-flags-4.html#post2894444

Read full topic
item.source: Checking if a tile is walkable client-sided?
